casebody.data:
STATE of Missouri, Respondent,
v.
Stuart HAROLD, Appellant. WD 80597 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: MAY 1, 2018 Julia Elizabeth Neidhardt, Jefferson City, MO, Counsel for Respondent. Christian Lehmberg, Columbia, MO, Counsel for Appellant. Before Division Four: Mark D. Pfeiffer, Chief Judge, Presiding, Anthony Rex Gabbert, Judge, Edward R. Ardini Jr., Judge

ORDER

Per Curiam:

Stuart Harold appeals from a judgment convicting him of burglary in the first degree, arguing that the evidence was insufficient to show that when he unlawfully entered the Anson residence, he did so with the intent of assaulting Nicholas Haill. We affirm. Rule 30.25(b).
